name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 79: The Shisenshou
overview: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 79 - The Shisenshou is a puzzle game similar to the Shanghai series since the player have to find 2 pieces of the same shape & colour that are alone to join them and make them disappear, the player have to follow an order since he can make 2 pieces disappear if they are surrounded by other different pieces, except when the 2 equal pieces are one next to the other. To advance to the next stage, the player has to clear off the pieces in each stage before the time ends. The game features different puzzles, a help button (pressing triangle Button) that shows the next possible combination of pieces.
